title: Set up a Temporary Bar
description: For a large festival, a temporary beer garden is being set up on an outdoor plaza.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the operations team to set up the physical bar and barriers.
Place an order for the required inventory (kegs, cups) to be delivered to the temporary location.
Schedule bartenders to staff the temporary bar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and fills the necessary shifts in the scheduling system.

tasks.description: Request a temporary POS terminal from the IT department for the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs a request for the IT team.
